main event: A civilian observed a peculiar trail-shaped object over Dayton, Ohio on December 26, 1963.
interesting points: The object displayed colors shifting from blue-white to orange and then white., The observation lasted for about 15 minutes., The witnessed object was reported to have crossed over Dayton at an elevation of approximately 6000 feet., The sighting was also confirmed through another observation source labeled as 'TX'., The object was the only one reported during the sighting.
